response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This unique offering holds immense value to both of us, with its worth estimated at $1,500,000. Our product represents a significant investment in innovation and quality, designed to meet your specific needs and exceed your expectations.

Considering the exceptional nature of this product and its potential impact on your endeavors, I propose a purchase price of $1,200,000. This offer reflects a strategic balance between the intrinsic value of the product and the financial considerations that guide our business decisions.

Should you find this proposal favorable, I would be honored to facilitate the transaction promptly. For any questions or further details, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this remarkable product into your possession.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
